name: Teriyaki Sirloin Steak Soba
description: Grilled sirloin steak with soba noodles cooked in curry oil with mangetout, bok choi, red and spring onions, chilli and beansprouts in a teriyaki sauce. Garnished with coriander and sesame seeds.

name: Chicken Katsu Curry
description: Crispy panko-coated chicken served with a mild curry sauce, rice, and a side salad.

name: Spicy Miso Ramen
description: Bold miso broth with minced chicken, bean sprouts, and corn.

name: Shoyu Ramen
description: Classic soy-based ramen with marinated chicken and bamboo shoots.
